summary: Dont want to be raided by imperials again and need some protection download and endorse this awesome defense more and never be attacked by imperials or anyone faction again!
descriptionHtml:
Description:
The imperials raided your home once and it wont happen again. With this mod it adds defenses to your sanctuary to keep any faction that wants the Dark BrotherHood gone.

Location:
Outside Dawnstar Sanctuary it will work even if u didnt beat the questline but i highly recommend you do it first because its fun and then it becomes your home.

Later add-ons:
Guards and followers
Random Imperial attacks
Towers and Lookouts
Add-on to the Sanctuary

Endorse:
Endorse and leave a comment so i know you guys want those add-on\'s so and i will do them as soon as possible.
author: Saddydog
